monster.name: Flame

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: Flame has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: Flame has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Flame exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.description: Source: Winghorn Press - The Wolves of Welton

monster.name: Bolt

trait.name: Pack Tactics

action.name: Bite

action.text: Bolt exhales blast of blue lightning in a 30-foot line. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
